pageContext.claim: “Thanks to our policies America is experiencing the fastest and biggest recovery.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is counting his chickens before they hatch. The National Bureau of Economic Research, which officially dates U.S. business cycles, has not yet concluded that this recession has ended. The 2001 recession lasted only eight months and it appears the current recession is on track to exceed that. Sometimes Trump says "fastest labor market recovery" but while many jobs have been recovered there are also permanent job losses and an uncertain outcome as long as the pandemic continues.
